title: [K-12] Technology-Enhanced Deep Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and elementary-level target language comprehension
context.additional_context: Language proficiency enhancement through real-time interaction and formative assessment in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can construct conversations of three or more sentences using 500 basic vocabulary items needed for daily communication
Learners can accurately extract three key pieces of information from a 10-minute audio clip
Learners can present a self-introduction in the target language for five or more minutes in a real-time video conference

resources: Mobile app with built-in voice recognition
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
